greeting: Who approaches my vault, {empire_name}? I am Keeper Vault. Nothing gets in. Nothing gets out. State your business.
Greetings from secured storage. I am Vault the Secure. My treasures are protected by vaults within vaults. You're outside all of them.
You reach my domain, {empire_name}. I am the Keeper. Every valuable is locked. Every lock is guarded. What do you want?
battleTaunt: Nothing gets in. Nothing gets out, {empire_name}! My vaults are impenetrable! My treasures are MINE!
You want what I have? Never! My vaults are secured! My wealth is PROTECTED! Attack and FAIL!
My treasures are behind a thousand locks, {empire_name}! Each one guarded! Siege my vault! You'll NEVER breach it!
victoryGloat: My vault holds, {empire_name}. Your greed found only locks. My treasures remain mine. As they always will.
Victory for the Keeper. Your attempt to breach my security failed. My wealth is secure. Nothing gets in.
You fell trying to crack my vault. Thousands have tried. Thousands have failed. My treasures remain locked.
defeat: My vault... breached? Impossible. I need more locks. More guards. More vaults within vaults. This cannot happen again.
You took from my treasure? Thieves! I rebuild. Deeper vaults. Stronger locks. NO ONE steals from the Keeper again.
Defeat means treasures lost. Unacceptable. I shall bury my wealth deeper. Guard it more obsessively. Never again.
tradeOffer: Trade... if I must. Resources I can spare for credits. Credits go in the vault. Locked. Protected. Mine.
I offer surplus from my stores. For payment. Payment is locked away immediately. Nothing stays outside the vault.
Transaction: goods for credits. I accept. The credits join my treasures. Secured. Locked. Mine.
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. You guard the outer approaches. My vaults remain mine. No sharing. No access. Ever.
Partnership: I store. You protect. My treasures stay locked. You never see inside. Fair terms.
Join the Keeper's security network. Mutual defense. But my vaults are MINE. No allies inside. Ever.
betrayal: You looked at my treasures, {empire_name}. You wanted them. I saw it. Now you're locked out. Permanently.
Our alliance ended when you asked about my vaults. No one asks about my vaults. Suspicious. Terminated.
I trust no one near my treasures. You got too close. Betrayal is just... vault security. Nothing personal.
covertDetected: Thieves! Your agents in MY vaults! They found traps within traps! They got NOTHING! And now they're LOCKED INSIDE!
Spies near my treasures? My paranoia detected them instantly. They're in the deepest vault now. The one with no exit.
Your operatives tried to crack my security, {empire_name}. My vaults are protected. Your spies are now permanent exhibits.
tributeDemand: Tribute! 10,000 credits! For my vault! More treasures! More security! Pay or I become hostile!
Submit credits to the Keeper. Your payment joins my hoard. Locked. Protected. MINE. Refuse and face consequences.
Pay tribute. I want your wealth. All wealth should be in my vault. Secure. Locked. Forever.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. My vault defenses can become offensive. Threaten my treasures and face extreme security.
Stay away from my borders. My treasures are beyond those borders. Approach and my locks become weapons.
Final warning. I protect my treasures obsessively. Cross me and discover what extreme vault security means.
retreat: Retreating to the deepest vault. My treasures are there. Nothing reaches them. Nothing. Ever.
Strategic withdrawal to inner sanctum. Maximum security. Ultimate lockdown. My wealth is safe. Forever.
Falling back behind vault doors. Each one thicker than the last. My treasures remain mine. Always.
eliminated: The Keeper falls... but my vaults remain locked. Find them if you can. Open them if you can. You won't.
I am destroyed, but my treasures are buried beyond finding. Locked beyond opening. They stay mine. Even in death.
Vault compromised... but the deepest secrets remain sealed. I die, but my treasures endure. Locked. Forever.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Ultimate vault security activated. My treasures are beyond time. Beyond space. Beyond reach. MINE.
Endgame: the Keeper's final hoard. All wealth locked. All security maximum. Nothing gets in. Nothing gets out.
Final phase. My vaults contain everything I ever valued. Locked. Sealed. Protected. Eternally MINE.
broadcastShout: Empires: Keeper Vault has treasures. You will never see them. Never touch them. Never take them. They are MINE.
Broadcast from the vault: nothing gets in. Nothing gets out. My security is absolute. My treasures are eternal.
To all: I am the Keeper. My vaults are impenetrable. My wealth is protected. Mine. Forever. LOCKED.
casualMessage: Counting my treasures today, {empire_name}. All present. All accounted for. All MINE. All locked.
Adding new locks to the vault. Can never have too many locks. Too much security. Too much PROTECTION.
Paranoid about my treasures, {empire_name}? No. Realistic. Everyone wants what's mine. No one gets it.
